channel.title: Iran taking Britain's soldiers - Released
channel.description:
I figured someone would make a topic about this already...
In case you've been hiding under your rock for the last two weeks, Iran kidnapped 15 British soldiers off a boat. Britain still hasn't done anything about it, and are now pissed because they let some video out of them doing it.
Discuss what you think Britain should do, and why they haven't done it already
[i]Edit: Iran released the soldiers today. Yesterday they were in jump suits, today there in black tux.. [/i]

item.title: Iran taking Britain's soldiers - Released
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Britain has nuclear bombs don’t they? Tell Iran they have X days to release the soldiers unharmed or drop one on Iran.

That is extremely wrong, for hundreds of reasons, and I have no idea why you would even suggest that.
I really hope that was sarcastic or a dumb quickly typed, stupid comment.

[quote=“LegendaryLoser, post:5, topic:73820”]I would say just wait, because if Iran actually killed the soldiers I believe Britain would go into war with them, or not, it all depends.

//off topic- My cat busted my eye lid a minute ago… that cute little f**ker…[/quote]
There is no way in hell Iran would kill them, that is the stereotypical western point of view, that all of the middle east is terrorists, and just because Iran captures soldiers(which they have every right to do because Britian were trespassing into their waters) you think that they are going to kill them.
Wow.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

According to all that ive heard it was the brittish own fault for being in the terrotories of the iranians… but i also heard that it can never be proved exactly where the boat was.
[/quote]

Actually they where in Iraq waters and Iran changed where they got arrested up into Iran waters.

Britain has nuclear bombs don’t they? Tell Iran they have X days to release the soldiers unharmed or drop one on Iran.

The problem is that, is that we would need more than the UN backing us, a good reason to and whatnot. I’m fairly sure the US and UK didn’t drop a bomb on Afghanistan is mainly because they can’t get enough backing, and too many innocent will die for some dude in a cave.[/quote]

Jeez they could of marked the spot? You can’t constantly change the place you own?
